message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8500? I believe this would still provide a good deal for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
